item.description:
New Year's Eve Afterlife Party and Concert at Lyric Hall

Help me ring in the new year in style! Yes, I know this is last minute but if you're like me, you're still looking for that right place to be at midnight. I can't think of a better place than Lyric Hall.

YOU MUST BUY A TICKET TO ATTEND:

Tickets are $45 for one. Multiple tickets are discounted, so bring friends! http://chrissygardner.ticketleap.com/nye/

The end of the world will soon be behind us on December 21st! Have you planned your afterlife party?

Join Saint John Cavaliere at the golden gates of Lyric Hall for a New Year's Eve afterlife party and concert!

With a never-ending stream of hors d'oevres and refreshments surrounding you, Westville's own Chrissy Gardner will serenade you with a heavenly line-up of special guests including Professor John, Abigail Zsiga, Robert Messore and Tim Kane!!

DOORS OPEN AT 8:30 P.M.!!

Restrictions Must be 21 or older to attend The Afterlife Party.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a vintage tuxedo.Call me on my cell phone if you can't find us. 203-895-7253
item.name: New Year's Eve Afterlife Party and Concert at Lyric Hall 12/31 9PM-2AM
